infobox.info_default: HOVER THE OPTIONS TO SEE MORE INFORMATION...
infobox.info-busto: Illustration focused on the upper part of the character, covering from the chest to the head.
infobox.info-half-body: Character representation from the waist up, including arms and hands.
infobox.info-full-body: Complete character illustration from head to toe. Includes all clothing details, accessories, and posture, ideal for full design visualization.
infobox.info-lineart: Finished artwork with clean defined lines only, without colors or shading.
infobox.info-r-basic: Flat and uniform coloring, applied over the lineart. Defines the main colors of the character without light or depth effects.
infobox.info-r-normal: Complete coloring with shading, including light, shadow, and gradients. Adds volume and dimensionality to the illustration.
infobox.info-detailed: Adding complex details such as textures, reflections, fabric patterns or special effects.
infobox.info-scenario: Simple illustrated environment or background to contextualize the character.
infobox.info-grayscale: Monochrome illustration in black, white, and gray tones.
